insert.foreach: INSERT INTO report (user_name, report_code, report_number, report_title, report_year, report_contents, report_file, report_origin_file, user_id, create_date, modify_date) VALUES (#{item.user_name}, #{item.report_code}, #{item.report_number}, #{item.report_title}, #{item.report_year}, #{item.report_contents}, #{item.report_file}, #{item.report_origin_file}, #{item.user_id}, NOW(), NOW())
